inputSpec.label: VCF file
inputSpec.help: The input VCF file. Must have a GT field.
inputSpec.name: vcf

inputSpec.label: bam file
inputSpec.help: The BAM file of the sample you are filtering on. Typically the tumor.
inputSpec.name: bam

inputSpec.label: Reference Genome
inputSpec.help: A fasta containing the reference sequence the BAM file was aligned to
inputSpec.name: reference

inputSpec.label: Sample
inputSpec.help: The sample name of the sample you want to filter on in the VCF file.
inputSpec.name: sample

inputSpec.label: Output Prefix
inputSpec.help: Prefix of the output vcf file
inputSpec.name: output

inputSpec.label: Min Read Pos
inputSpec.help: Minimum average relative distance from start/end of read.
inputSpec.name: min_read_pos

inputSpec.label: Min Strandness
inputSpec.help: Minimum representation of variant allele on each strand.
inputSpec.name: min_strandness

inputSpec.label: Max mm qualsum diff
inputSpec.help: Maximum difference of mismatch quality sum between variant and reference reads (paralog filter).
inputSpec.name: max_mm_qualsum_diff

inputSpec.label: Max var mm qualsum
inputSpec.help: Maximum mismatch quality sum of reference-supporting reads.
inputSpec.name: max_var_mm_qualsum

inputSpec.label: Max mapqual diff
inputSpec.help: Maximum difference of mapping quality between variant and reference reads.
inputSpec.name: max_mapqual_diff

inputSpec.label: Max readlen diff
inputSpec.help: Maximum difference of average supporting read length between variant and reference reads (paralog filter)
inputSpec.name: max_readlen_diff

inputSpec.label: Min var dist 3
inputSpec.help: minimum average distance to effective 3prime end of read (real end or Q2) for variant-supporting reads
inputSpec.name: min_var_dist_3
